page.title: 06Chinese New Year: 05300182
page.content: This year is the year of the Tiger. When it is Chinese New Year we have a celebration in China town. There is always a dragon dance. There will be two men holding the dragon. One man will be holding the head of the dragon and the other man will hold the tail. Whey they are ready there will be some men drumming the drums and the dragon will start to dance. The dragon goes to every restaurant and the restaurant people hand some money and lettuce up high and then the dragon has to try to get it. So when the dragon gets the money and the lettuce he has to pretend to eat the lettuce. When they have done it the dragon will go to another restaurant to do it again and they will get a lot of money and this is how you say 'Happy New Year' in Chinese. (Gong hay Fat Choi)
